articles.title: Fifth Third Bancorp to buy Comerica for $10.9 billion in tie-up of big regional banks
articles.description: Fifth Third Bancorp is buying Comerica for $10.9 billion in an all-stock deal, tying up two big regional banks. The buyout will create the 9th largest U.S. bank with approximately $288 billion in assets, the companies said Monday.
